fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Digital Agenda and digital policy more widely, Digital Single Market, Transatlantic relations
goals__remit: Advice and counsel to commercial and non-commercial organisations on engagement with the institutions of the European Union
industry_forums: Advisor to the Steering Committee, European Internet Forum (previously known as the European Internet Foundation).
relevant_communication:
Principle author :  "The Digital World in 2030, What Place for Europe".  Published by the European Internet Foundation (now Forum) in March 2014. 
 
Author, "Transatlantic Partnership 2020 - the Digital Dimension", published by the European Internet Forum
